attributes.action: To get tougher on people who park in Mother and baby spaces without having children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is happening more and more often that people without children are parking in spaces available to mother and babies caulsing people with children to have to park further away and most of the time walk even longer in the rain etc. These spaces are ment for a reason so people parking in them without children should be asked to move or even fined. You would get clamped on a double yellow line so why should people get away with this?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
